Class AdminScheduleController

java.lang.Object
com.group18.controller.admin.AdminScheduleController
public class AdminScheduleController extends Object
Controller for managing movie schedules in the admin interface. Handles displaying schedules, creating new schedules, and deleting schedules.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      private void initialize()
      Initializes the controller. Sets up the initial state, table columns, and event listeners for the schedule creation and month selection.

    • setupTableColumns

      private void setupTableColumns()
      Sets up the columns for displaying schedule information in the tables for both halls.

    • setupActionsColumn

      private void setupActionsColumn(javafx.scene.control.TableColumn<Schedule,Void> column)
      Sets up the actions column, adding delete functionality to the schedule table.
      Parameters:
      column - the column to set up

    • handleDeleteSchedule

      private void handleDeleteSchedule(Schedule schedule)
      Handles the deletion of a schedule, confirming with the user before deleting.
      Parameters:
      schedule - the schedule to be deleted

    • showScheduleCreationDialog

      private void showScheduleCreationDialog()
      Displays a dialog for creating a new schedule.

    • validateInputs

      private void validateInputs(javafx.scene.Node createButton, javafx.scene.control.ComboBox<Movie> movieComboBox, javafx.scene.control.ComboBox<String> hallComboBox, javafx.scene.control.DatePicker datePicker, javafx.scene.control.ComboBox<LocalTime> timeComboBox)
      Validates the input fields for schedule creation, enabling or disabling the create button.
      Parameters:
      createButton - the button to enable/disable
      movieComboBox - the movie selection combo box
      hallComboBox - the hall selection combo box
      datePicker - the date picker
      timeComboBox - the time selection combo box

    • isValidDate

      private boolean isValidDate(LocalDate date)
      Checks if a given date is valid for the selected month.
      Parameters:
      date - the date to check
      Returns:
      true if the date is valid, false otherwise

    • showAlert

      private void showAlert(String title, String content)
      Displays an alert dialog with a given title and content.
      Parameters:
      title - the title of the alert
      content - the content text of the alert

    • getStatusText

      private String getStatusText(int availableSeats)
      Returns the status text based on the available seats.
      Parameters:
      availableSeats - the number of available seats
      Returns:
      a string representing the schedule's status

    • filterSchedulesByMonth

      private void filterSchedulesByMonth(LocalDate selectedMonth)
      Filters the schedules based on the selected month and updates the table views for Hall A and Hall B. The schedules are divided into two categories based on the hall (1 for Hall A and 2 for Hall B).
      Parameters:
      selectedMonth - The selected month to filter the schedules by.

    • setupButtonHoverAnimation

      public void setupButtonHoverAnimation(javafx.scene.control.Button button)
      Sets up a hover animation effect for the given button. The button will scale down when pressed and scale back to its original size when released or the mouse exits.
      Parameters:
      button - The button to apply the hover animation to.
